FuncDef: This command enabled access to LUDB for PPPoE and PPPoEoA v4and v6 hosts under the capture SAP. The name of this local user database must match the name of local user database configured under theconfig>service>vprn/ies>sub-if>grp-if>pppoehierarchy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the local-user-database, up to 256 characters.
